Please, do not upgrade. there is a bug in this version that will not allow you to login.
Please, do not upgrade. there is a bug in this version that will not allow you to login.
Please, do not upgrade. there is a bug in this version that will not allow you to login.

We made plenty of bug fixes to improve the stability of the app. A few notable issues fixed with this release:

- Hide username on connect.
- Fix issue with some in-app-purchase not registering
- Reduce frequent disconnects.

A lot of you have emailed us regarding hiding the username on connect. Too many users, both girls and guys, have been skipping over chances to chat. Our guess is that showing the username is causing too much bias amongst who users choose to chat with. If you concern is that you will repeatedly connect to the same person, don't worry. The system prevents reconnects for up to 30 minutes.

Thanks for supporting the app. Please tell your friends about it and leave us a good review.

- Fix issue with Video Chat not working on iPad
- Migrate Elite Status from purchasable with credits to a in-app-purchase subscription option. (Please be aware that if you have any unused credits, you will have to use them to purchase elite status before upgrading to this version. The option to use credits to purchase elite status has been removed.)

- We have improved our video chat feature. The video will be blurred until both user's face is in view.
- You can now directly report other users for inappropriate behavior for the video chat screen.
- We have added AI to detect obscene content in videos. Your account will be banned for violating our terms of service.
